member.name: T:GdprInfo.GdprCountries
member.summary: A collection of countries in the European Economic Area (Eea) and subject to the GDPR regulation.

member.name: P:GdprInfo.GdprCountries.Countries
member.summary: Returns all countries that are in the European Economic Area and subject to the GDPR regulation.

member.name: P:GdprInfo.GdprCountries.IsoCountryCodes
member.summary: Returns only the ISO country codes from the EEA country list.

member.name: P:GdprInfo.GdprCountries.CountryNames
member.summary: Returns only the country names from the EEA country list.

member.name: P:GdprInfo.GdprCountries.CountryNumbers
member.summary: Returns only the country numbers from the EEA country list.

member.name: P:GdprInfo.GdprCountries.LongCountryCodes
member.summary: Returns only the long country codes from the EEA country list.

member.name: T:GdprInfo.Country
member.summary: Model that contains country name, iso code, number and long alphabetic code.

member.name: T:GdprInfo.GdprInfoService
member.summary: Provides information about whether the current device is in the European Economic Area (EEA) or not. If it is, the app should ask for user consent if personal information is collected and processed by the app or other third party apps to comply with the GDPR regulation.

member.name: T:GdprInfo.IDeviceCountryIdentifier
member.summary: The purpose of this interface is to be able to fetch the ISO country code of the current device. Network and Sim data should be always prioritized if available.

member.name: M:GdprInfo.IDeviceCountryIdentifier.TryGetDeviceCountryCode
member.summary: Try to get the ISO uppercase country code of the current device.
member.returns: ISO uppercase country code or null if not found.

member.name: T:GdprInfo.IGdprInfoService
member.summary: Service for looking up country information of the current device and if it is in the European Economic Area / subject to the GDPR regulation or not.

member.name: P:GdprInfo.IGdprInfoService.IsDeviceInEeaOrUnknow
member.summary: Check if the request location of the current device is in the European Economic Area / EEA or unknown.
member.remarks: If the location of the current device is unknown this will return true, because we have to assume that the device might be in the European Economic Area.

member.name: P:GdprInfo.IGdprInfoService.IsoCountryCode
member.summary: Get the ISO country code of the current device. Null in case that no country information could be retrieved from the current device for what ever reason.

member.name: P:GdprInfo.IGdprInfoService.CountryName
member.summary: Get the country name of the current device. Null if is not in EEA.
member.remarks: The collection only contains detailed information about countries in the EEA. So in case that isn't included in the collection, this will return null.

member.name: P:GdprInfo.IGdprInfoService.CountryNumber
member.summary: Get the country number of the current device. Null if is not in EEA.
member.remarks: The collection only contains detailed information about countries in the EEA. So in case that isn't included in the collection, this will return null.

member.name: P:GdprInfo.IGdprInfoService.LongCountryCode
member.summary: Get the long country code of the current device. Null if is not in EEA.
member.remarks: The collection only contains detailed information about countries in the EEA. So in case that isn't included in the collection, this will return null.
